programs.name: SUSTOLT
programs.description: Stolt migration for stacked data or common-offset gathers

parameters.name: noffmix
parameters.description: number of offsets to mix (for unstacked data only)

parameters.name: tmig
parameters.description: times corresponding to rms velocities in vmig (s)

parameters.name: vmig
parameters.description: rms velocities corresponding to times in tmig (m/s)

parameters.name: smig
parameters.description: stretch factor (0.6 typical if vrms increasing)

parameters.name: vscale
parameters.description: scale factor to apply to velocities

parameters.name: lstaper
parameters.description: length of side tapers (# of traces)

parameters.name: lbtaper
parameters.description: length of bottom taper (# of samples)

programs.name: SUTIFOWLER
programs.description: velocity analysis via Fowler's method

parameters.name: getcvstacks
parameters.description: flag to set to 1 if inputting precomputed cvstacks

parameters.name: vminstack
parameters.description: minimum velocity panel in m/s in input cvstacks

parameters.name: etamin
parameters.description: minimum eta (see paper by Tariq Alkhalifah)

parameters.name: etamax
parameters.description: maximum eta (see paper by Tariq Alkhalifah)

parameters.name: neta
parameters.description: number of eta values to image

parameters.name: vpvs
parameters.description: assumed vp/vs ratio (not critical -- default almost always ok)

parameters.name: vmin
parameters.description: minimum velocity panel in m/s to output

parameters.name: vmax
parameters.description: maximum velocity panel in m/s to output

parameters.name: nv
parameters.description: number of velocity panels to output

parameters.name: nvstack
parameters.description: number of stacking velocity panels to compute

parameters.name: nxpad
parameters.description: number of traces to padd for spatial fft

parameters.name: lmute
parameters.description: length of mute taper in ms

parameters.name: nonhyp
parameters.description: 1 if do mute at 2*offset/vmin to avoid non-hyperbolic

parameters.name: lbtaper
parameters.description: length of bottom taper in ms

parameters.name: lstaper
parameters.description: length of side taper in traces

parameters.name: salias
parameters.description: fraction of output frequencies to force within sloth

parameters.name: p
parameters.description: Enter a path name where to put temporary files.

parameters.name: ngroup
parameters.description: Number of cmps per velocity analysis group.

parameters.name: printfile
parameters.description: The output file for printout from this program.
